item.title: The Habits of Original Thinkers
item.description: Adam Grant’s TED talk explores the unexpected habits of original thinkers. He shares insights from psychological research on what sets originals apart and how anyone can become more original. Procrastination Boosts Creativity Research by Grant and his student Jihae found a “sweet spot” for creativity with moderate procrastination.
